price: Iyo (mu kirere no ku isi) haza kuba hari izindi mana zitari Allah, byombi byari kuba mu kaduruvayo. Ubutungane ni ubwa Allah, Nyagasani Nyiri Ar’shi[1] ihambaye, nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamwitirira.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Surat ul Araf, Aya ya 54.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
